Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2011 10:11PM sonofacancermom wrote: Hi Debra (Mom)- We want you to hang on and stay strong to beat this awful disease.  Don't give up!  We are praying and hoping that this drug will help you "get over the hump" so we can meet you at the beach this summer. We also pray for all of you fighting this awful disease!  Hang in there and fight! Love, Shawn, Mindy, Cadence, and Randy.
Posts.Title: Calling All Liver Mets-Need Input dragonfly stitchyphish
